channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Cult Unique Classes (Part 1 sup and invest)
channel.description:
[**Flagellant**] [**Cult Support**] [**Unique**] The _Flagellant_ is a unique Cult class converted from "Support" classes.
**Passive Ability 1:** [_Bleed Me Harder_] - You are immune to bleeding. You will know if the "Cult Leader" uses rupture.
**Passive Ability 2:** [_More Blood_] - When you are sacrificed, the Cult Leader will gain a rupture charge and an eradicate charge. (This replaces the sacrifice's ability of giving two eradicate charges.)
**Day Ability 1:** [_Hemorrhage_] (1 Uses) - The Cult Leader's Rupture Target will bleed one night sooner.
**Night Ability 1:** [_Flagellate_] (2 Uses) - The Cult Leader's Convert Target will bleed if they were not converted. They will bleed to death in two nights.
**Night Ability 2:** [_Gratified_] (2 Uses) - The Cult Leader's Eradicate ability will bleed a visitor of one of the two targets.
------ [**Courtesan**] [**Cult Investigative**] [**Unique**] The _Courtesan_ is a unique Cult class converted from Investigative classes.
**Day Ability 1:** [_Drug and Escort_] (2 Uses) - You will escort the target to jail tonight. The target will think they are speaking with the Prince. You cannot execute the target. The target does not become immune from death. The Cult will be notified that you are escorting tonight, but not who. Does not work on occupy immune players.
**Night Ability 1:** [_Convey_] (2 Uses) - The Cult will know who visited you and your target.
